name: Smeargle
author: Midori Harada
flavor_text: Once it becomes an adult, it has a tendency to let its comrades plant footprints on its back.

poke_power.name: Portrait
poke_power.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), if Smeargle is your Active Pokémon, you may look at your opponent’s hand. If you do, choose a Supporter card you find there and use the effect of that card as the effect of this power. This power can’t be used if Smeargle is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Tail Rap
attacks.effect: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.
